definition: see 北京癱|北京瘫[Bei3 jing1 tan1]

sentences.english: Ge You is an old stager in Chinese film industry.
sentences.chinese: 葛優是中國電影界的老戲骨。

sentences.english: Ge You have to shoot a new film ?
Ge You speaks carefully in public to protect himself from being hurt.
sentences.chinese: 葛優在公共場合說話很小心，保護自己不被傷害。

sentences.english: The film If you are not the one starred the famous film star Ge You.
sentences.chinese: 電影《非誠勿擾》由著名影星葛優主演。

sentences.english: The films Ge You acted in always win a number of awards and earn much money .
sentences.chinese: 葛優參演的電影都會獲得好多獎且票房也不錯。

definition: to volunteer for/to offer to undertake
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
not to engage in honest work/to ignore one's proper occupation/not to attend to one's proper duties

marginalized people (not part of mainstream society)/marginal man (term coined by social psychologist Kurt Lewin, referring to a person in transition between two cultures or social groups, not fully belonging to either)
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
